channel.title: 508 Help Please?:(
channel.description:
Im new to 508's and i dont really ubnderstand how to edit things such as the name in log in screen so like 'Welcome to ......Scape' and also how to make owner/hidden admin/admin/mod. ive looked in all the files but in the players/characters it shows connections not 'Character rights=0' Like im used to in 317s ^^
I R CONFOOSED =O
HELPEH MEH! <3

item.title: 508 Help Please?:(
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

In login.java, search the original owners name, then you will see his name, and the rights beside it, edit his name to yours, then for editing stuff liek welcome to …Scape, and you wanna edit everything to your username, i suggest looking through all the server .java files, if you just wanna change that, client.java is there for you.

Read full topic
